akn:section.akn:heading: Signing of records delivered for filing to Mayor.

akn:content.akn:p: The initial articles of organization shall be signed by at least one organizer.
A statement of cancellation under ยง 29-1003.02(d) shall be signed by at least one organizer.
Except as otherwise provided in paragraph (4) of this subsection, a record signed on behalf of an existing limited cooperative association shall be signed by an officer.
A record filed on behalf of a dissolved association shall be signed by a person winding up activities under ยง 29-1012.06 or a person appointed under ยง 29-1012.06 to wind up those activities.
Any other record delivered on behalf of a person to the Mayor for filing must be signed by that person.
